english.segment1: Tale as old as time. True as it can be. Barely even friends. Then somebody bends. Unexpectedly
english.segment2: Just a little change (oh, oh). Small, to say the least. Both a little scared. Neither one prepared. Beauty and the Beast
english.segment3: Ever just the same (In your eyes, am I beautiful?). Ever a surprise (Love like this is a miracle). Ever as before. Ever just as sure. As the sun will rise
english.segment4: Tale as old as time. Tune as old as song. Bittersweet and strange. Finding you can change. Learning you were wrong
english.segment5: Certain as the sun (oh, oh). Rising in the east. Tale as old as time. Song as old as rhyme. Beauty and the Beast
